name: Nikki Finke
description:
Who is the most hated man in Hollywood?

Producers Harvey Weinstein, Scott Rudin, and Joel Silver are often cited. All are Jewish. Rats.

But who is the most hated woman in Hollywood?

Perhaps it's Nikki Finke?

The journalist/blogger behind Deadline.com wields a rumor network that spans the entire movie industry. She can make or break careers with a stroke of a keyboard. She has public feuds with most of Hollywood. Oh, she is so despised!

Little is known about Finke; she keeps her entire life shrouded in mystery. In fact, what you see is the only existing photograph of her. Don't even try to take another, for she will sue.

We do know one thing for sure:

Finke is Jewish.

Rats.
